Description.Text: The hotel enjoys a quiet location in the heart of the Cannaregio Venetian. The Rialto Bridge is a 15 minute walk. Just a 3 minute walk to the Grand Canal and just 70 meters water buses, allowing you to easily navigate this amazing city before returning to his unforgettable accommodation.

The luxurious hotel offers a truly unique Venetian accommodation in a restored seventeenth century. Step back in time to enter and enjoy its sumptuous decor. The historic hotel features original frescoes, exposed beams, chandeliers and Murano glass traditional terraces. It also has all the modern amenities. Some rooms are equipped with bath hidromasaje. It offers free Wi-Fi.
